Information
All mercenaries have in the title the inscription [Merc] which is written after the character’s price.
––––––– Mercenaries receive the following bonuses:
– Getting Adena for killing enemies +10% – Getting Blood of the Enemy +50%
–––––––
If the character is in the clan, the system will automatically exclude him from the clan, without penalty.
A character who is in the status of a Mercenary is forbidden to use some of the functions of ordinary players. Watch the system chat carefully.
